info.name: SIM ABSENSI API
info.description: API Documentation for SIM ABSENSI (Attendance Management System)

item.name: Authentication

request.description: Login endpoint for regular users using email and password
Login endpoint for admin users using username and password

item.description: Authentication endpoints for users and admins

item.name: User Profile

request.description: Get current day's activity for the authenticated user, including expected_check_in_time and lateness info
Get personal statistics for the authenticated user

item.description: Endpoints for the authenticated user (requires Bearer {{token}})

item.name: Attendance

request.description: Check in for attendance. Validates location, work schedule, and lateness status.
Check out for attendance. Calculates total working hours.
Get today's attendance status for the authenticated user
Get attendance history for the authenticated user with optional filters

item.description: Attendance management endpoints for users (requires Bearer {{token}})

request.description: Create a new user (employee). Password is optional - if not provided, NIP will be used as default password.

query.description: Search term for name, email, nip, telepon, divisi, or mapel
Field to sort by (id, name, email, nip, telepon, divisi, mapel, created_at, updated_at)

request.description: Retrieve all users with pagination, search, and sorting functionality
Retrieve a specific user by their ID

item.name: Get User Detail with Attendance History

request.description: Retrieve user details along with their complete attendance and absence history

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Update an existing user's information. All fields are optional.
Delete a user from the system

formdata.description: Excel file (.xlsx, .xls, .csv) with columns: nama, nip, email, no_telepon, divisi, mapel

request.description: Import employee data from Excel file. File must be in xlsx, xls, or csv format with columns: nama, nip, email, no_telepon, divisi, mapel. Password will be set to NIP by default.
Get all absence records with pagination (Admin only)

item.name: Statistics

request.description: Get today's dashboard statistics including total employees, present employees, late arrivals, and absent employees

query.description: Month name in Indonesian (januari, februari, etc.) or English (january, february, etc.) - required
Year in YYYY format (optional, defaults to current year)

Get annual attendance statistics including monthly breakdown and yearly totals for attendance, sick leave, permission, and unauthorized absences
